summary: *Steven Universe* is an animated TV show about a boy named Steven (Zach Callison) who lives with magical alien friends, the Crystal Gems, in Beach City. It follows his journey growing up and helping the Gems protect the world. The series was created by Rebecca Sugar and aired on Cartoon Network from 2013 to 2019, with a movie and a follow-up series. It's known for its LGBTQ+ themes, great music, and unique world. The show won many awards and has a big fan base.
title: Steven Universe
